function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependence on accurate data collection and reporting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks of big data usage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of modeling studies for misinformation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying on extrapolation of classic infection-control and public health measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of extreme quarantine measures and detailed contact tracing for the scale of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential ineffectiveness of traditional public-health strategies for tackling covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 due to increased contagion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and lack of physical distancing","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled transmission and high infectious period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent movements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of multiple measures simultaneously without clear evaluation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of travel bans in reducing covid-19 cases outside wuhan and hubei","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear replication of control measures and effectiveness outside china","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underreported cases of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large fraction of the population remains at risk of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of travel ban and emergency response leading to 744,000 confirmed covid-19 cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate individual control measures during chinese spring festival holiday","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High incidence of confirmed cases in hubei and other provinces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Initial high case reproduction number r0 of 3.15","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of control measures on trajectory of the epidemic outside wuhan city","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementing emergency control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective prohibition of intercity travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate response to outbreak in cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid dispersal of covid-19 from wuhan due to travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strong correlation between number of cases and travelers from wuhan","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delayed arrival of covid-19 in other cities due to travel ban","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of travel restrictions and social distancing measures in preventing the spread of infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission patterns and the impact of interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive data on covid-19 epidemiology, human movement, and public health interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission of the sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale travel movements during the spring festival holiday","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of vaccine or specific drug treatment for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases from wild animals to humans","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of zoonotic disease transmission through wildlife conservation activities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Movement of researchers from higher income countries to developing countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective monitoring and intervention activities during perturbations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 from local communities to endangered great ape populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declines in food security, trade, and tourism leading to reduction in incentives to conserve local biodiversity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Boosting of tourism revenues leading to negative impacts on biodiversity conservation and wider sustainability goals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enhanced public interest in sustainability and community action","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Opportunities for health and well-being in nature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"One health approach in guinea-bissau and indonesia","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global travel restrictions leading to decreased tourism and economic impact on conservation sites","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased focus on local conservation leading to overcrowding and environmental degradation at local sites","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Renewed interest in national parks and conservation leading to overexploitation and disturbance of natural ecosystems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced local capacity due to travel and work restrictions and lost training opportunities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of partnerships","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interspecies transmission and pandemic risk","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 restrictions on human movement and trade on habitats, with quantifiable data lacking.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deterioration of stability leading to an increase in violence, illegal hunting, and illicit trade due to acute perturbations such as war or strife.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
